nginx.install: apt-get install -y nginx && systemctl enable nginx && systemctl start nginx

exim4.install: apt-get install -y exim4 exim4-daemon-heavy && systemctl enable exim4 && systemctl start exim4

dovecot.install: apt-get install -y dovecot-core dovecot-imapd dovecot-pop3d && systemctl enable dovecot && systemctl start dovecot

php8.3-fpm.install: add-apt-repository -y ppa:ondrej/php && apt-get update && apt-get install -y php8.3-fpm php8.3-mysql php8.3-curl php8.3-gd php8.3-mbstring php8.3-xml php8.3-zip && systemctl enable php8.3-fpm && systemctl start php8.3-fpm

php8.2-fpm.install: apt-get install -y php8.2-fpm php8.2-mysql php8.2-curl php8.2-gd php8.2-mbstring php8.2-xml php8.2-zip && systemctl enable php8.2-fpm && systemctl start php8.2-fpm

php8.1-fpm.install: apt-get install -y php8.1-fpm php8.1-mysql php8.1-curl php8.1-gd php8.1-mbstring php8.1-xml php8.1-zip && systemctl enable php8.1-fpm && systemctl start php8.1-fpm

roundcube.install: DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y roundcube roundcube-core roundcube-mysql roundcube-plugins

clamav.install: apt-get install -y clamav clamav-daemon && systemctl stop clamav-freshclam && freshclam && systemctl start clamav-freshclam && systemctl enable clamav-daemon && systemctl start clamav-daemon

fail2ban.install: apt-get install -y fail2ban && systemctl enable fail2ban && systemctl start fail2ban

ufw.install: apt-get install -y ufw && ufw default deny incoming && ufw default allow outgoing && ufw allow ssh && ufw allow http && ufw allow https && echo 'y' | ufw enable

python3.install: apt-get install -y python3 python3-dev python3-pip python3-venv

redis-server.install: apt-get install -y redis-server && systemctl enable redis-server && systemctl start redis-server

mariadb.install: apt-get install -y mariadb-server mariadb-client && systemctl enable mariadb && systemctl start mariadb

nodejs.install: curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_18.x | bash - && apt-get install -y nodejs
